{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pentalogy of Fallot is a variant of tetralogy of Fallot, with an additional defect. The components of tetralogy of Fallot include ventricular septal defect, pulmonary stenosis, right ventricular hypertrophy, and an overriding aorta. The additional defect in pentalogy of Fallot is an atrial septal defect, as mentioned in Document [0]. Therefore, the correct answer is Atrial septal Defect (ASD).", "answer_choice": "A"}
